item.description:
For people who like Chinese food, want to learn more Chinese culture, and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English, and enjoy dinner with us. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community.

Take the T to NEMC/Chinatown, www.mbta.com.

For driving directions
http://maps.google.co...


We look forward to seeing you there! We gonna be there from 6:30pm to 8:00pm( or later depend how many people will attend)



People also can attend karaoke night with us at Golden Leaf. If interested it, Please RSVP for that event too. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: ask front dest where is chinese speaker meetup group!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Night Dinner Table
